text: Selda and Derek are an American songwriting duo, consisting of Selda Sahin (lyrics) and Derek Gregor (music), best known as the songwriters of the musical film Grind, starring Anthony Rapp, Claire Coffee and Pasha Pellosie.HuffPost They co-wrote Eric Michael Krop's pop album "Greater Things". ==Grind== ===Background=== In 2014, Selda and Derek composed the music for the short film Grind. The film is based on the popular hook-up app Grindr and stars Anthony Rapp.Broadwayworld.com ===Accolades=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Year !align="left"|Ceremony !align="left"|Category !align="left"|Recipient(s) !align="left"|Result |- |rowspan="1"|2014 |NYC Downtown Shorts Film Festival |Best LGBT Film |rowspan="1"|Grind | |- |rowspan="3"| 2014 |rowspan="3"| FilmOut San Diego |Best Overall Short Film |Grind | |- |Best Cinematography |Grind | |- |Outstanding Artistic Achievement |Grind | |- |rowspan="1"|2014 |Honolulu Rainbow Film Festival |Best Short Film |rowspan="1"|Grind | |- |rowspan="1"|2014 |SENE Music and Film Festival |Best LGBT Film |rowspan="1"|Grind | |- |} ==Popular Songs== * "The Storm" * "Brand New" * "Shotgun" * "Break His Heart First" * "Thanks, Illinois" * "Built To Break" ==Awards== Several of Selda and Derek's songs have been recognized as "Ones To Watch" by the Nashville Songwriters Association International, and their song "The Storm" was a finalist in the Great American Song Contest.Greatamericansong.com ==References== ==External links== *Official Website for Selda and Derek Category:American musical duos
title: Selda and Derek
